name: Intro
_source: # removes the map units, sticks to the roam units to start
# intro between Anuki and Simon outside Roland Manor:
# 1. Reiterate why they've come there: Morrissey's negotiations
# 3. Anuki talks about what she knows about Roland
s;Simon;Well, we're here.{w}{br}Still want to crash your father's negotiations?
s;Anuki;Hey, I'm not asking questions everytime you want to do something.
s;Anuki;I just want to know what's going on.{w}{br}I'm not sure why father and his generals are so secretive about this.
s;Simon;What do you know about Lord Roland?{w} Anything we should be worried about?

s;Anuki;Uh, not really.{w} But dealing with him is usually annoying.{w}{br}He sort of just claims land that isn't being actively maintained.{w}{br}And then it becomes a whole process.{w}{br}He takes our land,{w} we send troops.{w} He freaks out,{w} we negotiate,{w} we get the land back.
s;Anuki;Father's usually pretty open about his dealings with Roland, though.{w} I'm not sure what's different now.
s;Simon;Maybe he just doesn't want to bother you?{w}{br}If we're busy restoring order to the land, dealing with an opportunistic lord sounds like a distraction.
s;Simon;Uh, not that I'm saying it's a distraction now.{w} Well, you know what I mean.

s;Simon;Anyway, I share your concerns.{w} There's definitely something a bit off about all this.{w}{br}But maybe it'll just be a routine negotiation.{w}{br}House Morrissey will get its land back,{w} and maybe Roland will be more cautious in the future.
s;Anuki;I can only hope.{w}{br}But enough talking, let's head in.{w}{br}We wouldn't want to miss everything after we've come all this way.
